description.value: The effects of the smoke created by an alchemist’s bomb duplicates the effects of @Compendium[pf1.spells.ppeb97nxg1rmdpme]{Contagion} instead of @Compendium[pf1.spells.g33euis7yi9pwddy]{Fog Cloud}, filling an area equal to twice the bomb’s splash area for 1 round per level. An alchemist must be at least 8th level and must have the smoke bomb discovery before selecting this discovery.
